Texts.Chs: 把^orange;EPP模块 (酸蚀护盾) ^reset;带给这名科学家。(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Acid Shield^reset; augment to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 也许有一天，我还会麻烦你这样的天才来帮助我，但是...我现在需要一个人思考一会儿，抱歉。
Texts.Eng: Perhaps one day I might call on your talents to help me with a little problem I am having...I'll need to consider.

Texts.Chs: 你现在可能苦恼于如何在不同环境的星球上生存。让我教你制造一些^green;EPP模块^reset;！把你自己制作的^orange;EPP模块(酸蚀护盾)^reset;给我看看！
Texts.Eng: You're probably starting to have some issues surviving by now in different biomes. So let's get you building ^green;augments^reset;! Show me an ^orange;Acid Shield^reset; augment made by your own two hands!
